thread.title: Save 25% on Independent Coffee Guides
thread.title_full: Save 25% on Independent Coffee Guides - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save 25% on Independent Coffee Guides
text: A must-have for latte lovers, the Northern and South West Independent Coffee Guides are the first of their kind outside London. With lots of luscious photography, write-ups on the venues, handy maps and a good shot of coffee ephemera on the side, these essential guides showcase over 80 speciality coffee venues and roasters in each region. All entries are hand-picked by a committee of coffee experts, including the UKâ€™s top barista Maxwell Colonna-Dashwood. They all meet strict criteria based on quality of coffee served, expertise, and the use of the highest quality UK-roasted beans. How To Claim: Click here and use the code telegraph25 to claim 25% off your Independent Coffee Guide. Offer is valid until the end of September, 2015. @telegraph
